attributes.action: To make it illegal to own one guinea pig
attributes.additional_details: Because this is an animal welfare issue and it would benefit the animals well-being as a domestic animal to be kept in a pair and not on its own.
attributes.background: We would like a law passed (much like Switzerland) that it is illegal to just own one guinea pig because they are social animals and this is an animal welfare issue

rejection.details:
The Animal Welfare Act already creates a requirement to meet an animal's need to exhibit normal behaviour patterns andbe housed with, or apart from, other animals (if applicable): https://www.gov.uk/guidance/animal-welfare

Determining whether owning a single guinea pig was inconsistent with these requirements would be a matter for the courts.
